p: The initial number of LAB counts ( Figure 3) was 3.95 ± 0.18 log cfu/g (day 0). The number of LAB in AC ranged from 3.45 ± 0.46 log cfu/g on day 16 to 4.06 ± 0.08 log cfu/g on day four. In the case VPC, the highest count of LAB 4.31 ± 0.29 log cfu/g was marked on day 16 of storage, and the lowest 3.69 ± 0.08 log cfu/g on day 12. In VPRO, VP+F, and VP+S, the highest LAB counts of 3.95 ± 0.18 log cfu/g were observed on day 0, and the lowest comprised 3.35 ± 0.21 on day 12, 3.39 ± 0.48 on day 16, and 3.28 ± 0.39 log cfu/g on day eight for each group, respectively.
